rows.label: tlk45320123_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Did you know that there are special
enemies called "unique monsters"?

rows.label: tlk45320123_01_msg0002
rows.name:
They're supposed to be absurdly
powerful. Far stronger than your
average monster.

rows.label: tlk45320123_01_msg0003
rows.name:
If you pick a fight with one of them
unprepared, it'll be curtains for you.
I've heard some grisly tales...

rows.label: tlk45320123_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Don't you go charging in without
knowing what you're getting yourself
into first, do you hear?
